Parameters.Name: pCompSortType
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: sort type for components of consolidated elements ​

Parameters.Name: pCompSortSense
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: the sense of order for CompSortType either ‘Ascending’ or ‘Descending’. This applies only when the CompSortType is ByName. ​

Parameters.Name: pElSortType
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: sort type for all elements​

Parameters.Name: pElSortSense
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: the sense of order for ElSortType either ‘Ascending’ or ‘Descending’. This applies only when the ElSortType is ByName.​
